2015.context: Uber Technologies, Inc. is a mobility and delivery platform focused on ridesharing, food delivery, and freight. Global rideshare expansion. Massive funding rounds.

competitors.name: Lyft
competitors.notes: Primary US competitor focused on friendlier brand positioning

competitors.name: Didi Chuxing
competitors.notes: Chinese ride-hailing giant, later acquired Uber China

competitors.name: Ola
competitors.notes: Indian ride-hailing competitor

competitors.name: Grab
competitors.notes: Southeast Asian ride-hailing and super-app

competitors.name: Gett
competitors.notes: Ride-hailing service in Israel and Europe

competitors.name: Hailo
competitors.notes: Taxi-hailing app in UK/Europe

competitors.name: Sidecar
competitors.notes: Early ride-sharing competitor (shut down 2015)

competitors.name: Traditional Taxis
competitors.notes: Incumbent taxi industry fighting Uber's disruption

2020.context: Uber Technologies, Inc. is a mobility and delivery platform focused on ridesharing, food delivery, and freight. COVID devastated rides. Delivery saved company.

competitors.name: Lyft
competitors.notes: US ride-hailing competitor also struggling with pandemic impact

competitors.name: DoorDash
competitors.notes: Food delivery competitor that surpassed Uber Eats in US market share

competitors.name: Grubhub
competitors.notes: Food delivery competitor acquired by Just Eat Takeaway

competitors.name: Didi
competitors.notes: Chinese ride-hailing giant with global ambitions

competitors.name: Grab
competitors.notes: Southeast Asian super-app competitor

competitors.name: Bolt
competitors.notes: European ride-hailing and delivery competitor

competitors.name: Ola
competitors.notes: Indian ride-hailing platform

competitors.name: Instacart
competitors.notes: Grocery delivery competing for drivers and consumer attention

2024.context: Uber Technologies, Inc. is a mobility and delivery platform focused on ridesharing, food delivery, and freight. Profitable. Advertising and autonomous partnerships.

competitors.name: Lyft
competitors.notes: US ride-hailing competitor with ~25% market share, focused on rides only

competitors.name: DoorDash
competitors.notes: Food delivery leader in US, Uber Eats is #2

competitors.name: Waymo
competitors.notes: Autonomous vehicle competitor partnering with Uber but also competing

competitors.name: Tesla Robotaxi
competitors.notes: Emerging autonomous ride-hailing threat from Tesla

competitors.name: Grab
competitors.notes: Southeast Asian super-app with rides, delivery, and fintech

competitors.name: Didi
competitors.notes: Chinese ride-hailing giant recovering from regulatory issues

competitors.name: Bolt
competitors.notes: European ride-hailing and delivery platform

competitors.name: Instacart
competitors.notes: Grocery delivery competitor

2025.context: Uber Technologies, Inc. is a mobility and delivery platform focused on ridesharing, food delivery, and freight. Mobility platform leader. Competing with Lyft, DoorDash, Waymo.

competitors.name: Lyft
competitors.notes: US ride-hailing competitor focused on North American market

competitors.name: DoorDash
competitors.notes: US food delivery leader, Uber Eats competes globally

competitors.name: Waymo
competitors.notes: Alphabet's autonomous vehicle service expanding commercially

competitors.name: Tesla
competitors.notes: Robotaxi ambitions threaten ride-hailing model

competitors.notes: Chinese ride-hailing leader with international operations
